entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] WBT - tests broken due to old skiasharp package reference #92743
  • SampleProfiler EventPipe provider support for .net 8 Native AOT #92734
    9.0.0
  • tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.sh Timed Out on Mono OSX x64 with interpreter #92733
  • Correlation payload not found in Build browser-wasm linux Release WasmBuildTests build leg #92732
  • [Mono][Interp] tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.sh failed #92727
    9.0.0
  • [Android] baseservices/exceptions/unhandled/unhandled/unhandled.sh failed #92723
    9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Consider moving some huge tests to Pri1 #92722
    9.0.0
  • [QUIC] Port ephemeral key diagnostics on Windows from SslStream #92721
    9.0.0
  • [ARM64][FP16] Convert float/double to half via FCVTH #92718
    Future
  • HostedServiceStartupFaulted is logged with lower LogLevel than BackgroundServiceStoppingHost #92716
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Invoking async [JSExport] and [JSImport] kills the process on node, but works in browser #92713
  • When a package has native assets for multiple rids the host ignores assets for base rids #92706
  • C# dynamic parameter influences handling methods return #92701
  • JIT: Failed ccmp recognition #92699
    9.0.0
  • ReadOnlySpan<T>(in T) breaking changes #92693
  • Could emit branchless form of i <= 0b00111 && j <= 0b00111 for unsigned integers #92692
  • The compiler does not check that keys returned by the key selector passed to OrderBy are comparable #92691
  • Document HttpClient migration from HttpWebRequest/ServicePoint(Manager) #92690
    9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Use compile restart to emit a placeholder method body #92688
    9.0.0
  • The native AOT DLL library crash failed to generate a dump or catch an exception #92687

Closed

  • [nativeaot] SYS_SECCOMP signal on Android 9.0 and below #92196
  • ToString format on DateTime not working under Local System Account #92707
  • .NET 8.0.0-preview.5.23280.1 and Entity Framework Core can't read appsettings.json during migration #88046
  • Interop source generators failing build in dotnet/runtime when latest SDK is installed #92655
  • Iterate on config binding generator parsing pipeline to benefit from input caching provided by the incremental-generator feature #83534
    8.0.0
  • Basic Authentication via HTTPClientHandler not working for Android #81839
    8.0.0
  • JIT: stack walk failure in arm64 function fragments #91139
    9.0.0
  • Runtime installer build (packs.product) on Unix doesn't produce a binlog #49891
    Future
  • Runtime test output transcripts in the xml result files use excessive escaping rendering them basically unreadable #92092
    9.0.0
  • [Suggestion] Include msquic along with publish for linux #92598
  • Content security policy issue for embedded browser(chromium) in Blazor Web assembly .js file with eval() #92698
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.ReadsWritesClosedFinish_StreamDisposed #92649
  • .NET SDK 7.0.401 and msquic 2.2.0 break HTTP/3 on Linux #92617
  • Increase NativeAOT testing when NativeAOT is changed #72419
    9.0.0
  • Expand CoreCLR testing #67743
    9.0.0
  • Relax DynamicMethod to permit ref returns #92670
  • AspnetCore application tries to load Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native.amd64.dll at runtime on centos linux #92278
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • LSRA: PreferCalleeSave for non-localVar intervals #92744
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Small refactor to BuildElement to address NRT changes #92742
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm] Fix Wasm.Build.Tests on `main` #92741
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reenable pragma suppressions for config binder gen (+ JSON) #92740
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Add more static preinitialization support #92739
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Removes redundant code from `JsonCamelCaseNamingPolicy.cs` #92738
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add analyzer support for inline array access #92736
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #92731
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/8.0] Make config binding gen incremental (#89587) #92730
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Disabled failing tests on Mono Android and interpreter lanes to keep CI green #92728
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Report Requires diagnostics from dataflow analyzer #92724
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • WIP: [ios][tests] Trim on helix for libraries and functional tests on CI #92719
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Promote size-wise improvements in physical promotion #92717
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.ConvertToHalf #92715
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono][jit] Fuse SIMD extract and insert on arm64 #92714
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Supress policheck warning in blazor-sample #92711
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Make effect handling in lowering less conservative #92710
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • LSRA: Honor the register aversion decision during allocation #92709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold GC.KeepAlive for frozen objects #92708
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Disable MetricsSupport feature by default #92696
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix Common.Tests.GetPrettyName_CannotRead_ReturnsNull test for root user #92695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix target type unsignedness detection in genFloatToIntCast() #92694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated #92684
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Define `getWasmIndirectFunctionTable` before initializing the #92683
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Improve disk full test #92682
    area-System.IO
  • Add plain Vector128 support to IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher #92680
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Put HasNativeCodeReJITAware into GetFunctionAddress #92665
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Revert "Remove Latin1CharSearchValues (#91884)" #92726
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Avoid membarrier on lower Android versions #92686
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Updated XML documentation for `IConfigurationProvider.GetReloadToken`. #92720
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] GetChromeVersions: Fix fetching v8 version given a chrome version #92667
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0] Remove all PGO assets except for the runtime PGO archive. #92735
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Fix LLVMAOT Mono runtime variant official build to produce correctly named runtime packs #92737
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix LLVMAOT Mono runtime variant official build to produce correctly named runtime packs #92712
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Move more sprintf usages to snprintf #92674
    area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • Remove all PGO assets except for the runtime PGO archive. #92668
    area-Infrastructure
  • Change how test assemblies opt-in to LibraryImportGenerator usage #92661
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Don't build libraries native packages in the PGO leg #92729
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocking-official-build, 9.0.0
  • Make config binding gen incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Add illink analyzer support for field/property initializers #92600
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix arm64 fragment unwinding #92678
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [ARM64] Emit ldp for unrolled Memcmp #92704
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Make CoreCLR/NativeAOT assembly compile with .subsections_via_symbols on Apple platforms #92544
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix Excessive Encoding in Test Logs #92286
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Switch to etw python script #92508
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add tests for `UnsafeAccessor` on fields on generic types #92657
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0
  • Define bool as Interop.BOOL to prevent upper bytes setting native bool #92679
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Handle remainder accesses more precisely in physical promotion liveness #92651
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Implement Vector128.Shuffle () for llvm on x64. #92656
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/8.0] Define bool as Interop.BOOL to prevent upper bytes setting native bool #92681
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Fixed containment of STOREIND of HW intrinsics ConvertTo*/Extract* #92513
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Type load checks do not fail at compile time but produce a runtime exception #91261
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Make it possible to preinitialize HW intrinsic IsSupported #92666
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Extend preinitialization interpreter #92470
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92627
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Stop setting separate properties for BUNDLE_PROBE, HOSTPOLICY_EMBEDDED, PINVOKE_OVERRIDE #92448
    area-Host
  • Convert SpinWait to QCall #92675
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Avoiding trying to load the native library Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native.<arch>.dll on Linux #92492
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Min/Max{Magnitude} #92618
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors

Updated

  • [mono] Enable SIMD intrinsics on winx64. #92673
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Adding AVX512 path to Base64 encoding/Decoding #92241
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 9.0.0
  • Use a different crossgen2 when running crossgen2 during our build than the crossgen2 that we are shipping #92677
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Unify and clean up unspilling #91663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove Unwrap flag from UniqueComInterfaceMarshaller #92599
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • LSRA: Update the way we set `delayRegFree` #92496
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Converge Representations between NativeAOT and CoreCLR #91821
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use P256 for PCP X.509 test #92646
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Make `TypeDescriptor` thread safe with custom providers by enlarging `lock` region #92521
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • #ifdef out code that requires FEATURE_EVENT_TRACE #91895
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Memory mapped stresslog for NativeAOT #92506
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert tests under GC subtree to the merged test model #92543
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][MacOS] Run tests on iOS 17 and MacOS 14 scouting queues #88479
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing of valuetype scheme #92637
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Move Microsoft.NETCore.DotNetAppHost off of pkgproj #92621
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • WIP: [mono][tests] Enable trimming for libraries and functional tests on CI #92645
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix #91958: use `mach_timebase_info` to determine process time coefficient on macOS #92185
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Fix linux-x64 AOT-llvm perf job #92644
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • WIP: [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement japanese calendar data #92471
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Light up String.Manipulation APIs with Vector512 codepath #92579
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [llvm] Fix spilling of valuetypes to the stack if they are passed by … #92658
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [wasm] Use specific version of v8 for library tests #91633
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update TensorPrimitives aggregations to vectorize handling of remaining elements #92672
    area-System.Numerics

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Container tooling creates many HTTP connections #35753
  • Redistribute the portable RID graph from the Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms transport package #35750
    9.0.1xx

Closed

  • GenerateDepsFile does not support P2P references with multiple output assemblies per TFM #2494
    Backlog
  • [workload] Machine readable outputs should only output JSON #22887
    8.0.2xx
  • `--arch` option doesn't support Docker-style architecture names like `--runtime` does. #35756
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Detect correctly multitargeted apps for trim/AOT/single-file warnings #35767
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Avoid running new APIs under older TFMs #35765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update 8.0.2xx for loc #35761
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Pass failure message reported from from getApplyUpdateCapabilities in WASM to dotnet watch #35755
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Containers: reuse HTTP connections more. #35754
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add spelling exclusions file #35716
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • IDE0049 "Name can be simplified" cleanup #35680
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IDE0017 "Object initialization can be simplified" cleanup #35679
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Declare dependencies for two Extensions.Logging packages #35760
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Workload commands: JSON only output adjustments #35640
    untriaged, breaking-change, Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2278413 #35586
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IDE0002 "Name can be simplified" cleanup #35675
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add dotnet package search command #35742
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IDE0090 "'new' expression can be simplified" cleanup #35681
    untriaged
  • branding update for 8.0.2xx #35661
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add --no-http-cache option #35107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Interceptors can cause an invocation of missing partial methods #70161
  • Feature "Document highlights" fails with exception when navigating in code using pointers #70159
  • Visual Studio keeps losing reference to App_Code.dll while coding. #70155
  • "Remove and sort usings" removed newline before first using #70153
  • [8.0.100-rc.2.23469.4] "error CS8938: The #line directive value is missing or out of range" exception in MVC app when generating html with Html Helpers #70150
  • Analyzer assembly load failure has too generic message #70148

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34127.137 #70152

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Testing insertion cost. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: update better conversion from expression rule #70158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Bump MSBuild.StructuredLogger package version #70157
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update default razor project cache file name #70156
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure GetRelatedDocumentIds() only returns IDs for source documents #70154
    Area-IDE
  • Handle generic types as parameters of attributes in `MetadataDecoder` #70151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Re-enable static graph evaluation #70149
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70146
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Allow only ordinary member method calls to be intercepted #70120
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix issue where change namespace throws if there are duplicate Progra… #70089
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Support 'wrapping' for collection expressions. #70060
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Port accessibility fix for the text view control in lightbulb preview #70112
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • [Backport] Port accessibility fix for the text view control in lightbulb preview #70147
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • [17.8] Handle 32bit Debug desktop in end-to-end test #70114
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add effective severities custom property array to error log #68892
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Address test feedback #70130
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • PERF: CompletionService.MergeAndPruneCompletionLists doesn't need to always sort #70111
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70145
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fall back to using .NET Core MSBuild if no VS is installed #70143
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Localize "Not Applicable" #70144
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • Collection expressions: avoid intermediate List<T> if spread elements have known length #69875
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Restore "Do source-generation only in our OOP process" #70109
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Public API for roslyn features (like CodeActions) to expose the ability to report progress as they run. #50211
    Area-IDE
  • Do not restrict to type argument list context when a name could resolve to a generic and a non-generic symbol #70122
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Create a brokered service to delegate loading of projects to us #69857
    Area-IDE
  • Fix reference finding for tuple fields and anonymous type properties #69804
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Properly parse members in type declarations missing an identifier #69798
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Set C# InteractiveWindow default to .NET Core #70127
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [17.8] Disallow `RequiresLocationAttribute` in more places in source #70133
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, 17.8
  • Expose AnalysisContext.MinimumReportedSeverity #70131
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Code Actions - Add fix all support #69853
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to use Static file authorization and Razor Pages & Blazor at the same time #50975
  • Exception after upgrade: An IL variable is not available at the current native IP. #50974
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, fortunes_dapper, json #50971
  • allow HtmlTargetElementAttribute to be inherited #50970
  • Upload files to a minimal API endpoint in .NET 8 #50968
  • Synchronize the state of RenderModeWebAssembly and RenderModeServer #50966
  • MinimalApi MapMethods with muti methods use WithOpenApi() throw Error! #50965
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Class level validation custom attribute is not supported. #50962
  • NETSDK1045 The current .NET SDK does not support targeting .NET 9.0. Either target .NET 8.0 or lower, or use a version of the .NET SDK that supports .NET 9.0. Download the .NET SDK from https://aka.ms/dotnet/download #50960

Closed

  • FindByEmailAsync in the UserOnlyStore is not actually an Async call #43973
    .NET 8 Planning
  • .NET Minimal API BadRequest response does not return the body #50964
  • AntiforgeryStateProvider always returns a null token in WebAssemblyPrerendered mode #50900
    8.0
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #50956
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #50948
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #50955
  • Hot reload not working with WASM components in Blazor 8RC1 component #50735
  • Blazor ServiceWorkerAssetsManifest Missing Scoped Css for Wasm Client #50856
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Identifying whether the page is server or client for RenderMode.Auto #50859
  • Output cache: serve cached response if request fails #50942
  • Make enhance navigation easy and predictable not harder. #50887
  • Add IOutputCacheBufferWriterStore #48854
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50973
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Disambiguate type names by containing assembly in WellKnownTypes #50969
    area-mvc, analyzer, area-minimal
  • [2.1] Fix IPNetwork.Contains for prefixes which are not at start of subnet range. #50967
    * NO MERGE *, area-networking, area-middleware, 2.1.x
  • fix: cancellationTokenSource memory leak #50958
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Support multiple claims with same type in the /manage/info response #50953
    area-identity

Merged

  • Fix blocking call in FindByEmailAsync #50603
    area-identity, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc2' => 'release/8.0' #50963
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 8.0.0
  • [Blazor] Antiforgery fix #50946
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Replace ''return'' with lambda expression ''=>''. #50711
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50952
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1
  • Update editorconfig with naming rules #50854
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Update SDK to 9.0.100-alpha.1.23476.6 #50949
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Use generated PInvokes and exchange types #50685
    area-networking
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Improvements to SSR component activation #50848
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Initializers fixes for Blazor Web #50860
    area-blazor
  • Auth with global interactivity #50920
    area-mvc
  • [release/8.0] Update SDK version #50734
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-27
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Update release/stable with latest main #4268

Merged

  • Update Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native version #4265

Updated

  • Update SOS to show the relevant information for the !ThreadPool command when using the Windows thread pool #4160

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CI iOS/Mac test measurements diverge when run locally #17700
  • [iOS] NSInternalInconsistencyException Completion handler passed to webView:decidePolicyForNavigationAction:decisionHandler: was not called #17699
  • Memory leak when scrolling a CollectionView with IsGrouped=true #17698
  • Android : Maui rc-1 crash on android #17697
  • WinUI - Circle view not rotating from center #17694
  • [MAUI] When entering words, both keyboards present word suggestions #17690
    .NET 8 GA
  • [WinUI] D6 pages are not case sensitive #17689
    .NET 8 GA
  • [MAUI] Click the "+"/"-" button to move the cursor, and the cursor disappears #17687
    .NET 8 GA
  • The page content changes when it is horizontally elongated for D19. #17686
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] [Android] Button: Set BackgroundColor/Background will increase vertical padding #17685
    .NET 8 GA
  • CollectionView scroll by code specifying offset in pixels #17684
  • MAUI: Listview button is partially visible on UI even with HasUnevenRows #17683
  • NRE in HideSoftInputOnTappedChangedManager.UpdateFocusForView #17681
  • Publish on `Windows` fails with `The target '_GenerateAppxPackage' does not exist in the project` #17680
  • AppWindow.Position, AppWindow.Move, and AppWindow.TitleBar all are faulty and give wrong results (simple code to reproduce included) #17679
  • Styles Layout Calculation can break when setting/removing elements dynamically #17678
  • [Android] VisualDiagnostics/IWindowOverlay with Shell still has issues loading #17677
  • [Android] Elements directly replaced within ScrollView do not respect HorizontalOptions #17676

Closed

Created

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Data annotations for join entity on many-to-many #31882
  • Composite FK annotation #31881
  • VB.Net Expression translation causes errors #31878
  • Get all is returning entities which has delete state #31875

Closed

  • Intentional breaking change in v8? #31855
    8.0.0
  • Adding items to child collections when parent has string PK column fails silently #31865
  • Temporary Key is inserted as ForeignKey #31559
    8.0.0
  • Add missing exception messages #31679
    8.0.0
  • Implement a subquery in a SqlExpression? #31858
  • Group By followed by Where and Count could not be translated #31504
  • Fail fast when using EF8 primitive collections with the Cosmos provider #31862
    8.0.0
  • Unable to create a 'DbContext' of type ''. The exception 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object.' when Dbcontext has HasDiscriminator() #31404
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31880
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/8.0] Don't remove entry from dependent map if it's not found in identity map. #31872
    Servicing-approved
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31879
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Add a missing exception message to IEntityMaterializerSource #31873
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31877
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/8.0] Fail fast when using EF8 primitive collections with the Cosmos provider #31863
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Move sentinel to end of AddProperty #31868
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31874
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/8.0] Set default discriminator value even when there are no derived types. #31853
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix to #30589 - Query/Json: improve JSON entity/collection comparisons to null (fails currently for optional dependent with all nullable properties) #31856
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Handle more types of value converters in the compiled model #31861
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NETSDK1045 The current .NET SDK does not support targeting .NET 9.0. Either target .NET 8.0 or lower, or use a version of the .NET SDK that supports .NET 9.0. Download the .NET SDK from https://aka.ms/dotnet/download #17426

PullRequests

Created

  • Include full path in poison report #17438
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #17435
  • Merge net9 runtime and known framework references into main #17433

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add Workload #17437
  • Add backport workflow #17407
  • Handle variations in branch names for triggering SB tarball build #17434
  • Branding 8.0.2xx #17408
  • Add net 9 known framework references into a stable codeflow PR #17432
  • Revert internal branch trigger changes #17429
  • Resolve branch name issue #17428
  • Handle vmr pipeline triggers for internal branches #17427
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add instructions on synchronizing the VMR #17424
  • Add instructions on synchronizing the code into the VMR #17414

Updated

  • Update input branches #17409
  • Poison current SBRP #17339
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Add support for loongarch64 architecture #17125
    Area-SourceBuild
